Sentencas: The current research study focuses on modeling solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power plants.
Titulo: Recurrent neural networks optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cells combined with the hydrogen fuel electrolyzer and reverse osmosis water desalination

Sentencas: For this purpose, in the research, three Integrated processes are presented to achieve the most optimal system from the perspective of energy and economics.
Titulo: Recurrent neural networks optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cells combined with the hydrogen fuel electrolyzer and reverse osmosis water desalination

Sentencas: An integrated SOFC is considered in the first model, the second model is focused on using the wasted heat from the first model as the entry of the Stirling engine, and in the third model, the excess energy of the Stirling engine is used to produce hydrogen with the help of proton exchange membrane electrolyze and also power generated by the first model turbine is used in desalination system to produce fresh water.
Titulo: Recurrent neural networks optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cells combined with the hydrogen fuel electrolyzer and reverse osmosis water desalination

Sentencas: Power generation and hydrogen production from the systems are considered the main two objective functions.
Titulo: Recurrent neural networks optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cells combined with the hydrogen fuel electrolyzer and reverse osmosis water desalination

Sentencas: Results show that in the presented system the most optimal state of energy efficiency is 39.6% and with an economic cost of 10.30 dollars per hour.
Titulo: Recurrent neural networks optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cells combined with the hydrogen fuel electrolyzer and reverse osmosis water desalination

Sentencas: The results also indicate that the presented energy system can produce 191 kW of output power, and 23 kg/s of hydrogen fuel with an economic cost of nearly 11 dollars/hour at its working point.
Titulo: Recurrent neural networks optimization of biomass-based solid oxide fuel cells combined with the hydrogen fuel electrolyzer and reverse osmosis water desalination
